name: What'sNiceThisTimeofYear
0:
”Alexa, open What's Nice.”
”Where should I go in May?”
”What's nice this time of year?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: what's nice
des: Ask Alexa for suggestions on where you should take your next vacation! Looking for recommendations for a future date, or packed and ready to go right now? Ask what's nice this time of year, or ask for a specific month. Be sure to ask Alexa to tell you more about the country she suggests!
